---

## Feature summary

A clear one-line summary of the feature.

## Motivation

Why is this needed? Which use case or adopter would benefit?

## Proposal

Describe the change (e.g., new spec section, new doc, new example). If it affects the protocol spec, note backward compatibility.

## Alternatives considered

Any alternative approaches you thought about.

## Additional context

Links, references, or screenshots if helpful.
